metadata.feature_description: Search, sort, and paginate through influence goals with configurable page sizes and multi-column sorting.

steps.action: Navigate to Community Settings > Influence tab
steps.expected: Influence goals table displays with search box
steps.actual: Influence goals table displayed with 13 items and search box present

steps.action: Enter 'likes' in the search box and press Enter
steps.expected: Table filters to show only goals containing 'likes'
steps.actual: Table filtered to show 2 items containing 'likes' in their descriptions

steps.expected: Search should be case-insensitive and return same results as lowercase
steps.actual: Search returned 2 items with 'likes' (lowercase) in their descriptions, confirming case-insensitive search

steps.expected: Table sorts by Weight in ascending order
steps.actual: Table sorted by Weight ascending (1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 2, 2, 4, 5) with arrow indicator showing ascending sort

steps.action: Click on Weight column header again
steps.expected: Table sorts by Weight in descending order
steps.actual: Table sorted by Weight descending (30, 20, 10, 10, 8, 4, 2, 2, 2, 1) with arrow indicator showing descending sort

steps.expected: Table sorts by Value in ascending order
steps.actual: Table sorted by Value ascending (1, 1, 1, 2, 3, 3, 5, 10, 10, 50) with arrow indicator

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Navigate through pages with Next button

steps.expected: Navigate to page 2 showing remaining items
steps.actual: Navigated to page 2 showing items 11-13 of 13 items with 'Page 2 of 2' indicator

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Navigate through pages with Prev button

steps.actual: Navigated back to page 1 showing items 1-10 of 13 items with 'Page 1 of 2' indicator
Table displayed 'Showing 0 Items' message with empty table body

observations: MinValue and MaxValue columns mentioned in the code are not visible in the table UI - the table only displays Goal Type, Weight, Value, and Actions columns

Page size for the Influence goals table is fixed at 10 items per page (hardcoded in pager initialization). The Page Size dropdown in the UI applies to Content/Comments settings, not the Influence goals table, so 'Change page size to 5, 10, 25, 50 items' scenario could not be tested via UI
Search throttling (500ms delay) is implemented in the code but not directly observable/verifiable through UI testing
Sort by GoalType column was not explicitly tested as it is the default sort; other sort columns (Weight, Value) were tested successfully
Sort by MinValue and MaxValue could not be tested as these columns are not displayed in the UI
